quest.name: The Qitari Book of Records
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol's tireless recordkeeping has all but exhausted her supply of writing materials.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid graphite in the Blind Forest of Yx'MajaDeliver the splendid graphite to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid tarichuk feathers in the Blind Forest of Yx'MajaDeliver the splendid tarichuk feathers to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid silver kitten near the Red ChaliceDeliver the splendid silver kitten to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Goodness me! I may not look it, but I'm incredibly busy. Just keeping track of the recent discoveries is enough to make my head spin! Not to mention all the maps and charts we draw...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: That's why I have to make detailed records of everything, and we only use traditional methods passed down from the Ronkans.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'll need several chunks of graphite, which we'll grind down and use to produce ink. Fear not, the reward will make it worth the trouble, I assure you!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'll need several tarichuk feathers, which we'll use for writing quills. Fear not, the reward will make it worth the trouble, I assure you!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'll need a silver kitten, whose skin is used in the ink-making process. Fear not, it's a type of fish, not an actual kitten! I must say, it's rather fortunate I remembered to mention that...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The Blind Forest is where we usually go to gather things like that, but none of the others can spare the time...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The Blind Forest is where we usually go to gather things like that, but none of the others can spare the time...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Our fishers usually go to the Red Chalice with a bucket of fruit worms to catch them, but I'm afraid you're the only one who can spare the time...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh, I am glad to see you safe and sound. I hope you didn't run into any trouble on my account!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Splendid! That's exactly what I was after! It won't be long before I'll have a brand-new set of writing supplies, with which I shall scrawl away to my heart's content!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Other than unearthing lost treasures, we Qitari love nothing more than keeping records of our achievements. Even those too young to write can often be seen drawing maps of the places they've visited. Adorable, isn't it?
